title: OPDS Configuration
description: Manage your OPDS credentials and control how your book collection is shared with reading apps. By default, all libraries you have access to will be included in the OPDS feed.

server.sectionDesc: Enable or disable OPDS and Komga API services to control access to your book collection.
server.opdsDesc: Enable the OPDS server to access your book collection through OPDS-compatible reading apps like KOReader, Moon+ Reader, etc.
server.komgaDesc: Enable the Komga-compatible API to use Komga clients (Tachiyomi, Komelia, etc.) with Booklore. Uses the same OPDS user accounts for authentication.
server.groupUnknownDesc: When enabled, books without a series will be grouped under "Unknown Series". When disabled, each book will appear as its own individual series.

endpoints.sectionDesc: Use these URLs to connect your reading apps to Booklore.

users.sectionDesc: Manage user accounts for OPDS and Komga API access. These are separate from Booklore user accounts.
users.emptySubtitle: Create your first OPDS user to get started

createDialog.title: Create OPDS User
createDialog.sortHint: This will determine how books appear in the OPDS feed for this user

deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete user "{{username}}"?
contactAdmin: Please contact your administrator to request permission.
komgaCopied: Komga API endpoint copied to clipboard
settingsError: There was an error saving the settings.
groupEnabled: Books without series will be grouped under "Unknown Series".
groupDisabled: Books without series will appear as individual series.
